Job Title: Business Analyst

Location: New York City Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Information Technology, Research

Description:
Company OverviewAugment Jobs leverages its software, recruiting expertise, and extensive network to automate the recruitment process for job seekers. The company partners with full-time employees, licensed recruiters, and employers to help job seekers navigate the oversaturated job market. Augment Jobs sources job opportunities for its clients and submits applications on their behalf once the clients approve the role. Augment Jobs clients save hundreds of hours on applications and focus their efforts on leveraging the platform to prepare for interviews.
Submit a staffing application to our recruiting team at https://airtable.com/appK6gxCEphlasWY6/shrA31a5FXCWvZAVd. 
Core ValuesClient Outcomes: We exhibit empathy on the nature of the job search process and include a Job Guarantee to ensure every client leaves Augment Jobs with a new job or promotion after working with us.Integrity: We represent our clients to employers and recruiters with the utmost honesty and transparency. This extends to all of our employees and clients who work with us. We work with candidates who accurately represent themselves and have an honor code.Partnership: We are committed to building and maintaining long-term relationships with our clients, coaches, and community.Education: We continuously learn and adapt to changing market conditions and inform our clients in real time on how to stand out in the job application process. Our clients can apply what they learn at Augment Jobs for the rest of their careers.Giving Back: We host free career consultations to build community and create accessibility.
Overview:We are seeking a detail-oriented and analytical-minded professional to join our team as a Business Analyst. As a Business Analyst, you will play a crucial role in understanding business processes, gathering requirements, and providing data-driven insights to support strategic decision-making. The ideal candidate will possess strong analytical skills, effective communication abilities, and a passion for contributing to the success of the organization.
Responsibilities:Requirements Gathering:Work closely with stakeholders to elicit, document, and prioritize business requirements.Conduct interviews, surveys, and workshops to understand business processes and user needs.Data Analysis:Analyze and interpret complex data sets to extract valuable insights.Provide recommendations based on data analysis to support business decisions.Process Mapping:Create process maps and workflow diagrams to visualize and document current and future states of business processes.Identify opportunities for process improvement and efficiency.Documentation:Prepare detailed and clear documentation of business requirements, functional specifications, and user stories.Maintain documentation throughout the project lifecycle.Collaboration with Development Teams:Work closely with development teams to ensure a clear understanding of requirements and provide ongoing support during the development process.Participate in Agile or other project management methodologies.Stakeholder Communication:Communicate effectively with stakeholders at various levels, translating technical concepts into non-technical language.Provide regular updates on project progress and address any concerns or issues raised by stakeholders.Testing and Quality Assurance:Collaborate with testing teams to develop test scenarios and validate that solutions meet business requirements.Assist in the resolution of issues identified during testing.Continuous Improvement:Proactively identify areas for process improvement and optimization.Stay informed about industry best practices and emerging trends in business analysis.
Qualifications:Bachelor’s degree in Business, Information Technology, or a related field.Proven experience as a Business Analyst, preferably in a technology-driven environment.Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.Excellent written and verbal communication skills.Familiarity with data analysis tools and techniques.Detail-oriented with a focus on accuracy and quality.Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment.Knowledge of project management methodologies is a plus.
Learn More:https://www.augmentjobs.com/

Experience Level (if available): None
